title: Ep. 371 - Student Loan Forgiveness Is Welfare For The Rich
description:
Bernie proposes a taxpayer bailout for all student loans in the U.S., Iran keeps provoking us to war, and that crazy lady accusing Trump of rape says more crazy things on television. Finally, the WH names a new Press Secretary—who isn't me. Date: 06-25-2019
